## BrowserSandboxOptions.unsafe property

Controls whether the browser sandbox shall be unsafe, meaning that it is not run in a sandboxed iframe element. DO NOT set this property to `true` unless you're in a testing environment that doesn't support sandboxed iframes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unsafe?: boolean;
```
